titleInfo.title: 1850 Feb. 22 [between] John R. Wilson, Davidson County, Tennessee [and] the Trustees of Washington Institute

mods.abstract: This is a legal document dated February 22, 1850, exchanging a land deed in Davidson County, TN, between John R. Wilson and the trustees of the Washington Institute. Wilson has conveyed for one dollar a piece of land to the Washington Institute for the establishment of a school. In return, the trustees agreed that Wilson and his heirs will be able to attend classes for free and will also retain a lien on the land. The witnesses are W. L. Wilson and Thomas B. Wilson.
